Detailed Description

This class calls the given callback class when a particle collides with the collision scene.

Member Function Documentation

void SplatPSA::callback ( SmartPointer< PyObject >  c  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the SplatPSA's callback property.

The callback is used to execute some scripted event when the particle collides with the scenery.

Parameters:
c The new callback script.

SmartPointer< PyObject > SplatPSA::callback (  )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the SplatPSA's callback property.

The callback is used to execute some scripted event when the particle collides with the scenery.

Returns:
The callback script.
